alert.note: Alert for Calvert (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued April 28 at 4:01AM EDT until April 29 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Calvert County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 2 AM EDT Saturday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, water is expected to reach backyards near 9th Street in North Beach, and could approach 9th Street. At 3.0 feet, parking lots near Charles Street in Solomons begin to flood, with several inches of water covering low- lying portions of Charles Street and Williams Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides two to two and a half feet above normal. High tide at Solomons Island is at 10:04 PM and high tide at Chesapeake Beach is at 11:47 PM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Chesapeake Bay at North Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 2.6 ft, Major 3.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 28/11 AM 2.6 1.2 1.4 2.0 None 28/11 PM 3.3 1.9 2.3 2.0 Minor 29/12 PM 3.0 1.6 1.8 0.5 Minor 30/01 AM 2.7 1.3 1.5 0.5 None 30/11 PM 2.9 1.5 1.9 1.0 None Patuxent River at Solomons Island MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 28/10 AM 2.7 1.2 1.4 1.0 None 28/09 PM 3.4 1.9 2.2 2.0 Minor 29/10 AM 3.1 1.6 1.8 1.0 Minor 29/11 PM 2.9 1.4 1.6 1.0 None 30/11 AM 3.0 1.5 1.7 1.0 Minor 30/11 PM 3.1 1.6 1.8 1.0 Minor &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
